description: Upstash Vector Store with search capabilities

index_url.info: The URL of the Upstash index.

index_token.info: The token for the Upstash index.

text_key.info: The key in the record to use as text.

metadata_filter.info: Filters documents by metadata. Look at the documentation for more information.

embedding.info: To use Upstash's embeddings, don't provide an embedding.
